amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: Sec.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to enter into a contract with an offeror for the purchase of an American flag if, as required by the Federal Acquisition Regulation, the flag is certified as a foreign end product.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with an offeror for the purchase of an American flag if, as required by the Federal Acquisition Regulation, the flag is certified as a foreign end product.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bustos amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bustos amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mrs. Bustos.
